bibl.title: Two Petitions in the Archive of Pankrates.
bibl.note: Supplement to: Lucia CRISCUOLO, Papiri tolemaici dell'Universit√† Cattolica di Milano, Simblos 4. Scritti di storia antica (Bologna, 2004) pp. 7-23 et pll. 1-2 [edition of: P. Med. Bar. Inv. 3 recto; 8 recto]. - Concerns also: P. Med. Bar. Inv. 2 verso (= S.B. XVI, 12721). A full reedition of the archive is a joint research object of the Ancient History research units of Leuven and Bologna.
CLARYSSE Willy and Lucia CRISCUOLO, Two Petitions in the Archive of Pankrates.
145.4 P. Med. Bar. Inv. 2 verso; Inv. 3 recto; 8 recto
